import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Card from '../common/Card'; import { DUMMY_DATA } from '../../constants'; const PatientList = () => { const [selectedPatient, setSelectedPatient] = useState(null); const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'active': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'upcoming': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'completed': return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; return (
{DUMMY_DATA.patients.map((patient) => (
setSelectedPatient(patient)} >
{patient.photo}

{patient.name}

{patient.therapy}

{patient.status}

{patient.nextSession}

))}
{/* Patient Details Modal */} {selectedPatient && (

Patient Details

{/* Patient Info */}
{selectedPatient.photo}

{selectedPatient.name}

{selectedPatient.age} years, {selectedPatient.gender}

Phone: {selectedPatient.phone}

Email: {selectedPatient.email}

{/* Current Treatment */}

Current Treatment

Plan: {selectedPatient.currentTreatment.plan}

Progress: {selectedPatient.currentTreatment.progress} ({selectedPatient.currentTreatment.sessionsCompleted}/{selectedPatient.currentTreatment.totalSessions})

{/* Medical History */}

Medical History

    {selectedPatient.medicalHistory.slice(0, 3).map((item, index) => (
  • â€¢ {item}
    • ))}
{/* Treatment History */}

Recent Sessions

{selectedPatient.treatmentHistory.slice(0, 2).map((treatment, index) => (

{treatment.therapy}

{treatment.date}

{treatment.notes}

))}
{/* Vitals & Medications */}

Vitals

BP: {selectedPatient.vitals.bloodPressure}

Pulse: {selectedPatient.vitals.pulse}

Weight: {selectedPatient.vitals.weight}

Medications

    {selectedPatient.medications.slice(0, 2).map((med, index) => (
  • ðŸ’Š {med}
    • ))}
{/* Allergies */}

Allergies

{selectedPatient.allergies.map((allergy, index) => ( {allergy} ))}
)} ); }; export default PatientList;
